examples.example: 昨天我度过了非常充实且快乐的一天。

translate.english: Yesterday I spent a very fulfilling and happy day.

examples.example: 昨天我去做了志愿者，帮助了许多有需要的人，真的很开心。

translate.english: Yesterday I went to be a volunteer and helped many people in need. I was really very happy.

examples.example: 昨天的阳光格外明媚，我的心情也随之变得格外舒畅。

translate.english: Yesterday's sunshine was exceptionally bright, and my mood also became exceptionally comfortable accordingly.
